```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(ISLR)
library(AppliedPredictiveModeling)
data("Weekly")

summary(Weekly)

```

```{r}
transparentTheme(trans = .4)
featurePlot(x = Weekly[, 1:8], 
            y = Weekly$Direction,
            scales = list(x=list(relation="free"), 
                        y=list(relation="free")),
            plot = "density", pch = "|", 
            auto.key = list(columns = 2))

```
